reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater warm, high quality, and incredibly soft, with a good fit and stylish appearance. The comfort receives mixed feedback, with some finding it comfortable while others describe it as scratchy. Moreover, customers disagree on the thickness, with some finding it skimpy. Additionally, several customers note that the size runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly soft!
items.body: My husband bought this sweater for me to wear during a upcoming trip to Iceland. It is very high quality, very stylish, incredibly soft, and since it is made from pure Alpaca wool, it will provide the extra warmth I will need. I appreciate the small Alpacas woven into the neck design. Read more
items.author: G Harris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SOFT and warm
items.body: washed on delicate and block dried. The sweater is lovely, sooo soft and warm, no itchiness like I have with wool. Love this sweater will be wearing it a lot now that the cold has arrived Read more
items.author: Heartsmile

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and fits women better than men
items.body: This is an unisex sweater but the fit is small for US sizing. If you are a girl buying this to wear as a tunic, it is a nice sweater and looks stylish. I bought size small for my teeage son but it’s too small for him (he’s 5’8” and very skinny.) i ended up wearing it cause it fits me better as a sweater/tunic (I’m only 5’2” and 102 Ib). The material is super soft on the outside when you touch it, but when I wear it, it’s scratchy and irritates my skin like wool does. Have to wear a thermo undernearth. I have other Alpeca wool sweaters and they don’t irritate my skin like this one so I’m guessing this is blended with wool. It is warm though. Read more
items.author: MilosMom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alpaca sweater
items.body: Very soft and pretty. Covers bottom. I am 5'5" and 155lb. I order XL due to other posts and it fit well. It says hand wash only. I washed on delicate cycle, cold water, by itself and hung over a chair to dry. It did not shrink and looked the same so I am keeping it. Good quality. Little pricey for a sweater but I loved it. Read more
items.author: Jeanie Yates

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tightfitting and kind of scratchy
items.body: I usually fit in a Medium but I decided to buy a size up to a Large. It fits the rest of me well and is tight around the wrists which is just fine. But I don't like how tight it is on my neck. It's almost like a choker. The first thing I noticed in the sleeves is that I can feel some of the fibers scratching or poking my arms. I was expecting this to be a lot more comfortable on bareskin. While super fuzzy, the sweater still looks good to me. And it's still comfortably warm. Read more
items.author: Chance

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice!
items.body: This handmade sweater looks beautiful and fits well. It is very soft and comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: H. Dupre

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight and warm
items.body: I’m happy with the sweater. True to size. Ample body and sleeve lengths as pictured in the description. Read more
items.author: Jacob L

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the peice
items.body: Sweater is just like the picture. It is soft but has some scratchy hairs. I wear a shirt under it. It is nice and warm. I like that it is long. Read more
items.author: Lynne

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White and Black, Light Blue Ii. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
